column5: Spacious private master bedroom on the 2nd floor of a 5500 Sqt spacious house in Plano, private direct entrance from kitchen, separate your suite from other guests for privacy. Spacious kitchen with two separate eating areas, fully equipped with oven, microwaves, Brand new washer and dryer available on site. Enjoy a cup of coffee in the greenness covered backyard oasis........
column8: Spacious private suite in center of Plano (Wi-Fi)
